message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Given its exceptional value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm proposing a starting price of $1,150,000. This is a rare opportunity to own something truly special.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe your offer doesn't fully reflect the true worth of this product. I'm open to finding a mutually beneficial agreement, so I'm proposing a counteroffer of $1,120,000. This price reflects the product's unique value while acknowledging your interest.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still think $1,120,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1,080,000. I believe this price is a fair reflection of the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  I'm aiming for a deal that benefits us both. To meet you closer to your offer, I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. I believe this reflects the product's value while demonstrating my commitment to reaching an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit away from $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you at $1,060,000. I think this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.
Bob, we're getting close. I appreciate you working with me. Let's wrap this up - I'm willing to accept $1,090,000. This is my final offer. It's a fair price that lets us both walk away happy.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit away from $1,090,000. I'm willing to meet you at $1,070,000. I think this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal here.
